title.narrative: CHILD RIGHTS SYSTEMS BUILDING

description.narrative: Systems for monitoring, reporting and responding to violations of children's rights are strengthened., which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Justice For Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2019, an increased proportion of children, who are vulnerable and exposed to violence, including those in humanitarian situations, are protected by prevention and response services, a supportive institutional and legislative framework and protective social norms.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Systems for monitoring, reporting and responding to violations of children?s rights are strengthened.

description.narrative: Iraq Monitoring and Reporting Mechanism for grave violations of child rights increased its reach and verification rate, so that timely and accurate reporting informs programming and advocacy. Children and families have increased knowledge of risks from unexploded ordnance (UXO), explosive remnants of war (ERW) and improvised explosive devices (IED) | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2019

title.narrative: Percentage of reported incidents of grave violations that are verified.(45690)
Existence of a National Strategy for the release and community-based reintegration of children from armed forces and groups(45692)
Existence of a fully functional UNICEF-supported mechanism to monitor and report on grave violations against children (MRM)(45689)
Functional inter-ministerial committee for dialogue with UN and to prevent and respond to grave violations.(54460)
